data.comment: Today's referee, Simon Hooper, has blown to start the match.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
In the minute 3, Conor Townsend hits the bar! Nearly a goal there for West Bromwich.
In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 4, Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Simon Hooper awards the home team a throw-in.
Fulham have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 5, Simon Hooper signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to West Bromwich's area.
In London Fulham drive forward through Bobby Reid. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in Fulham.
In the minute 7, Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ademola Lookman for Fulham drives towards goal at Craven Cottage. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Fulham.
Simon Hooper awards Fulham a goal kick.
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 12, West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at Craven Cottage.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 13, Simon Hooper signals a Fulham throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Tom Cairney is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Tom Cairney returns to the field for Fulham after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
West Bromwich drive upfield and Filip Krovinovic gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Ademola Lookman for Fulham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 19, West Bromwich have a goal kick.
Free kick for West Bromwich in the half of Fulham.
West Bromwich are whistled for offside.
In the minute 22, Ball safe as West Bromwich is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Fulham.
In the minute 26, Bobby Reid of Fulham gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Bobby Reid scores with a header and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 26, That's a fine assist from Aleksandar Mitrovic.
Throw-in Fulham.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
In the minute 28, Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Simon Hooper signals a Fulham throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Goal! Fulham extend their lead to 2-0 through Ola Aina.
In the minute 30, Aleksandar Mitrovic instrumental with a fine assist.
West Bromwich to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
Throw-in for Fulham close to the penalty box.
In the minute 32, Important block from the West Bromwich defence as Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa fires in a strike for Fulham.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Can Fulham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
In the minute 33, Simon Hooper signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
West Bromwich are caught offside.
Fulham have a goal kick.
In the minute 35, Throw-in high up the field for West Bromwich in London.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
West Bromwich's Karlan Ahearne-Grant breaks free at Craven Cottage. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of West Bromwich.
In the minute 39, Simon Hooper awards the home team a throw-in.
West Bromwich needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Simon Hooper blows against West Bromwich's Filip Krovinovic for offside.
In the minute 42, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
Can Fulham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
In the minute 44, West Bromwich awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Fulham.
In the minute 45, Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Simon Hooper awards Fulham a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for West Bromwich at Craven Cottage.
The first-half has come to a close in London.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in London.
Harrison Reed is on a sub for Mario Lemina for Fulham.
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 48, Conor Gallagher (West Bromwich) has received a yellow card from Simon Hooper.
Free kick Fulham.
Attention is being given to Fulham’s Joachim Andersen and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 50, Fulham's Joachim Andersen is back in action after a slight knock.
Throw-in for Fulham in their own half.
West Bromwich are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 53, Matheus Pereira (West Bromwich) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Fulham needs to be cautious. West Bromwich have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of West Bromwich.
In the minute 55, Bobby Reid (Fulham) has received a first yellow card.
The away team replace Matheus Pereira with Callum Robinson.
West Bromwich make their second substitution with Romaine Sawyers replacing Jake Livermore.
In the minute 57, Simon Hooper signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Ademola Lookman (Fulham) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Simon Hooper awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 58, Simon Hooper signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
In London, West Bromwich push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to Fulham.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for West Bromwich at Craven Cottage.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
Fulham have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 62, Corner awarded to Fulham.
In London Fulham attack through Joachim Andersen. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a West Bromwich goal kick.
In the minute 63, Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In London, Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa of Fulham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
West Bromwich have a goal kick.
In the minute 65, West Bromwich's Grady Diangana gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Fulham defender.
Throw-in West Bromwich.
Karlan Ahearne-Grant (West Bromwich) strikes at Craven Cottage but his header is cleared.
In the minute 68, Tom Cairney (Fulham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Fulham close to the penalty box.
Free kick for Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 69, Romaine Sawyers (West Bromwich) gets a yellow card.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Matt Phillips is replacing Filip Krovinovic for the away team.
In the minute 71, West Bromwich push forward at Craven Cottage and Callum Robinson gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fulham defence.
Simon Hooper signals a throw-in for West Bromwich, close to Fulham's area.
Simon Hooper awards Fulham a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Simon Hooper signals a Fulham throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
Fulham to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
Free kick Fulham.
In the minute 74, Can Fulham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside West Bromwich's half?
West Bromwich are pushing forward but Callum Robinson's finish is wide of the goal.
Fulham have a goal kick.
In the minute 75, Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in West Bromwich's half?
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of West Bromwich.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Simon Hooper signals a throw-in for Fulham, close to West Bromwich's area.
In London Fulham's Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa is caught offside.
In the minute 79, Callum Robinson (West Bromwich) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In London, Tom Cairney of Fulham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Bobby Reid (Fulham) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 81, West Bromwich awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of West Bromwich.
Harrison Reed is booked for the home team.
In the minute 84, Ademola Lookman (Fulham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Simon Hooper.
In the minute 85, Fulham to take a throw-in in West Bromwich territory.
Ivan Cavaleiro is on a sub for Bobby Reid for Fulham.
Simon Hooper signals a Fulham throw-in in West Bromwich's half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 87, Simon Hooper signals a free kick to West Bromwich in their own half.
Throw-in for West Bromwich close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Can West Bromwich get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fulham's half?
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Fulham needs to be cautious. West Bromwich have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to West Bromwich.
Simon Hooper signals a free kick to West Bromwich.
Free kick for West Bromwich in their own half.
West Bromwich drives forward and Grady Diangana gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in for West Bromwich at Craven Cottage.
Throw-in for West Bromwich in the half of Fulham.
Simon Hooper blows to end the match. The final score is 2-0.
Scott Parker (Fulham) is making a third substitution, with Joe Bryan replacing Ademola Lookman.
